original_text: So he died according to the word of the Lord which Elijah had spoken. And Jehoram reigned in his stead in the second year of Jehoram the son of Jehoshaphat king of Judah; because he had no son.
korean_text: 왕이 엘리야가 전한 여호와의 말씀대로 죽고 그가 아들이 없으므로 여호람이 그를 대신하여 왕이 되니 유다 왕 여호사밧의 아들 여호람의 둘째 해였더라

sentences.original_text: according to the word of the Lord
And Jehoram reigned in his stead
in the second year of Jehoram the son of Jehoshaphat
sentences.korean_translation: 여호사밧의 아들 여호람의 두 번째 해에
